channel.title: Hugo on Software Trinkets
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Software Trinkets

item.title: Publishing and hosting a website created through Hugo
item.description: After creating this site I’ve been changing what I want it to look like, created a logo, finished a second post so it wouldn’t be that empty when I launched it.

item.title: Creating a site using Hugo
item.description: Introduction> Introduction # Hello and welcome! This is the first post in this blog. This blog is meant as a way for me to keep track of all the little projects I want to do, and how those projects went.
